questions.question: What VTubers do you watch?
questions.answer: I watch a lot of VTubers, most of them are from Holoive. I also watch some independent talents.

questions.question: Do you have a favorite VTuber?
questions.answer: My favorite VTuber is Shiratama Utano. She's funny and cool. I also like her personality. Other oshis are Oozora Subaru from Hololive and Tokoyami Towa also from Hololive.

questions.question: What got you into VTubers?
questions.answer: It's during the pandemic. Staying at home, watching Vtubers became one of the best things to do.

questions.question: Do you watch Hololive?
questions.answer: Yes, Hololive, without a doubt is the most popular VTuber agency. From JP, EN to ID, they have a lot of great talents.

questions.question: What about Nijisanji?
questions.answer: I don't watch Nijisanji. I don't like the way they handle their talents. Especially the Selen Tatsuki, it's totally a disaster.

questions.question: Are you interested in VTuber technology?
questions.answer: I am kinda regret that I didn't do relevant studies in university. I should have done it. Now I am learning relevant technologies, hopt this could help my oshi in some way.
